parameters.name: buf_p
parameters.description: A pointer to the buffer that you want to copy the ACL into.

parameters.name: acl
parameters.description: The ACL that you want to copy.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the buffer pointed to by buf_p, in bytes.

full_content:
Function: acl_copy_ext
URL: https://www.qnx.com/developers/docs/7.1/com.qnx.doc.neutrino.lib_ref/topic/a/acl_copy_ext.html
Synopsis: ssize_t acl_copy_ext( void *buf_p,
Headers: #include <sys/acl.h>
Parameters:
  - buf_p: A pointer to the buffer that you want to copy the ACL into.
  - acl: The ACL that you want to copy.
  - size: The size of the buffer pointed to by buf_p, in bytes.
Examples:
Example 1:
#include <sys/acl.h>

ssize_t acl_copy_ext( void *buf_p,
                      acl_t acl,
                      ssize_t size );
